message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. I believe it will greatly benefit your needs and expectations. For this exceptional item, I am proposing a price of $100. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.
I'm interested in the product, but $100 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $80, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your feedback. I would like to counter your offer by suggesting a price of $90 for the product. This is the highest price I can reasonably offer while still ensuring a fair profit for us. I hope this proposal works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $90 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $85 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
